author: cschomak
body:
- Sign switch for y-range in GC plots reversed that was unintentionally introduced in PR 18699. (Switched input files for comparison to change display on x-axis, but forgot to switch the input for the differences plotted on the y-axis accordingly)

- Fixed the labels of the difference tables in the GC tool, which were showing the labels for the absolute positions
title: Small fixes in GC tool
